org.smooks.api.delivery

Interface ContentHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AfterVisitor, BeforeVisitor, ChildrenVisitor, ConfigurationExpander, Consumer, ContentHandlerFactory<T>, DOMElementVisitor, DOMSerializerVisitor, DOMVisitAfter, DOMVisitBefore, DOMVisitor, ElementVisitor, ExecutionLifecycleCleanable, ExecutionLifecycleInitializable, FilterBypass, InterceptorVisitor, JavaXMLReader, ParameterizedVisitor, Producer, SaxNgVisitor, SerializerVisitor, SmooksXMLReader, VisitLifecycleCleanable, Visitor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInterceptorVisitor, AbstractOutputStreamResource, BenchmarkVisitor, BibliographyVisitor, CloneResourceConfig, ConsumeSerializerVisitor, ContextObjectSerializerVisitor, CounterVisitor, DefaultDOMSerializerVisitor, DelegateReader, DomModelCreator, DOMReader, ElementPositionCounter, EventInterceptor, ExceptionInterceptor, Export, Exports, GhostElementSerializerVisitor, JavaContentHandlerFactory, MapToResourceConfigFromAttribute, MapToResourceConfigFromParentConfig, MapToResourceConfigFromText, MapToResourceConfigFromXml, NestedSmooksVisitor, NewResourceConfig, NullSourceXMLReader, ParameterDecoder, PropertyListParameterDecoder, SessionInterceptor, SetOnResourceConfig, SimpleSerializerVisitor, StaticProxyInterceptor, StreamResultWriterInterceptor, SystemConsumeSerializerVisitor, TerminateVisitor, TextConsumerInterceptor, TextSerializerVisitor, TokenizedStringParameterDecoder, XStreamXMLReader

    public interface ContentHandler
    Smooks resource and a target of content delivery.
